The Argentum is a ministry within the
Church of the [[Silver Flame]]. Originally dedicated to
the acquisition, study, and redistribution of [[magic item]]s and artifacts, it was repurposed during the [[Last War]] to serve as [[Thrane]]'s espionage agency. Where the [[Royal Eyes]] of [[Aundair]] specialize in information gathering, the Argentum excels at theft and extraction, and has access to the warehouse of dangerous artifacts it has gathered over centuries.
title: Argentum
